src:
Meja Absen Pleno Dipindah, Belum Ada Tanda Tangan Kehadiran Bamsoet
05 Nov 2019, 20:43 by Mochamad Zhacky
Jakarta - Meja absen rapat pleno Partai Golkar yang awalnya ditempatkan di gerbang kantor DPP dipindah. Jika melihat absensi sementara, tidak ada tanda tangan kehadiran Wakil Koordinator Bidang (Wakorbid) Pratama DPP Golkar Bambang Soesatyo (Bamsoet).
Pantauan detikcom di DPP Golkar, Jalan Anggrek Neli Murni, Slipi, Jakarta Barat, Selasa (5/11/2019), meja absen rapat pleno Golkar awalnya ditempatkan di gerbang kantor DPP. Namun meja itu dipindahkan ke lobi aula tempat rapat pleno digelar.
Melihat daftar absen, pengurus DPP Golkar yang menandatangani kehadiran di antaranya Sekjen Golkar Lodewijk F Paulus, Bendum Robert Kardinal, Ketua Korbid Ekonomi Azis Syamsuddin, serta Ketua Korbid Pemenangan Pemilu Jawa dan Kalimantan Nusron Wahid.
Berdasarkan pantauan di lokasi, Bamsoet memang belum terlihat. Nusron Wahid meyakini Bamsoet akan menghadiri rapat pleno Golkar malam ini. Sebab, Bamsoet merupakan anggota rapat pleno.
"Sebagai anggota pleno (Bamsoet) pasti datang. Saya datang," terang Nusron.
text:
Plenary Absentee Table Moved, No Sign of Bamsoet's Presence
05 Nov 2019, 20:43 by Mochamad Zhacky
Jakarta - The absence table of the Golkar Party plenary meeting which was originally placed at the gate of the DPP office was moved. If you see a temporary absence, there is no signature of the Primary Deputy Coordinator (Wakorbid) Golkar DPP Primary Bambang Soesatyo (Bamsoet).
AFP monitoring at the Golkar DPP, Jalan Anggrek Neli Murni, Slipi, West Jakarta, Tuesday (11/05/2019), the Golkar plenary meeting table was initially placed at the gate of the DPP office. But the table was moved to the lobby of the hall where the plenary meeting was held.
Looking at the list of absences, the Golkar DPP board members who signed the attendance included Golkar Secretary General Lodewijk F. Paulus, Bendum Robert Cardinal, Chairman of the Economic Korbid Azis Syamsuddin, as well as the Chairperson of the Java and Kalimantan Election Pemidul Nusron Wahid.
Based on the observation on location, Bamsoet is indeed not visible. Nusron Wahid believes that Bamsoet will attend the Golkar plenary meeting tonight. Because, Bamsoet is a member of the plenary meeting.
"As a member of the plenary (Bamsoet) will definitely come. I am coming," explained Nusron.
